query: Summarize revenue health for the last 30 days and the next 7-day outlook.
Why did revenue dip last week? Give key drivers and actions.
Call out the biggest anomaly day and what likely happened operationally (only using the provided data).
Which actions should we take today to prevent forecasted decline?
Draft an ops checklist to investigate a sudden revenue spike day.
Explain whether the week-over-week trend is improving and how confident you are.
Give a short summary of the main drivers and next actions.
Create a prioritised action plan to address any detected revenue drops.
If there are anomalies, propose actions for DoorDash/Uber Eats/Website teams.
Is the 7-day forecast above or below the most recent day? What should we do?
Give me 3 actions with owners embedded in the action text.
What data points most strongly support your conclusion?
If you are missing information, explicitly say what is missing and provide safe next steps.
Are we experiencing operational risk right now?
Which anomaly is most concerning and why?
Provide 4 recommended actions with reasons and priorities.
Give a concise action plan to improve on-time pickup and protect revenue.
Explain the likely causes of an outage that would create a revenue dip, without inventing facts.
Create a playbook for a revenue drop day: triage, diagnosis, remediation.
Tell me what to monitor in the next 24 hours based on forecast + anomalies.
What should the marketing owner do this week?
Give 3 actions to validate channel integrations and menu sync.
If I asked you to explain store-level drivers, what prevents you from doing that using the data you have?
Provide an action plan with low/medium/high priorities and cite at least 3 data points.
